DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Yoga Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Back problem among prevalent condition affect adult lead reason use complementary alternative medical ( CAM ) therapy . Despite common use CAM therapy back pain , little know compare conventional treatment . This study lay groundwork full-scale trial compare yoga conventional exercise usual care chronic low back pain . This study randomize 30 people chronic low back pain follow group : yoga , conventional therapeutic exercise program , usual care . There 12 week weekly treatment follow-up assessment via phone 6 , 12 , 26 week measure treatment 's impact symptom , function , quality life , utilization cost back pain related care .
